HeroSlider.slide1: We Have Over 15 Years of Knowledge and Expertise Importing and Distributing High-Quality Wooden Materials.
HeroSlider.slide2: Leveraging Our Expertise and Extensive Network to Deliver Products That Surpass Global Quality Standards.
HeroSlider.slide3: A Modern and Efficient Production Process Utilizing Expert Technicians and Cutting-Edge Technology.
HeroSlider.slide4: A Stronger, More Durable Wood with a Long Service Life, Suitable for All Weather Conditions in Thailand.
HeroSlider.slide5: Transported Chemical-Free, from Europe and Russia Over 16,000 km to Laem Chabang Port in Thailand.

AboutArea.title: Our Company
AboutArea.sub_title1: Discover the beauty and strength of
AboutArea.sm_des: We're passionate about providing high-quality, sustainable wood products that meet the diverse needs of our customers. With over 15 years of experience in the timber industry, we've built a strong reputation for excellence and reliability.
AboutArea.card1_des: Our commitment to sustainable practices means you can trust that our wood is sourced responsibly.
AboutArea.card2_des: For stunning DIY crafts and durable structures alike, our wood is the perfect choice. Contact us to learn more.

faq1.ans: High-quality conifer wood from leading production sources in Europe and Russia, with international standards, guaranteed strength, durability, and a long service life.

faq2.ans: Advanced and standardized production processes result in products that are precise, durable, and beautiful.

faq3.ans: With properties of strong wood including resistance to hot and humid weather conditions, our northern conifer materials perform excellently for both internal and external applications.

faq4.ans: Ships directly from Europe and Russia to Thailand in closed containers (FCL) to maintain quality and safety.

faq5.ans: Can be used in a variety of formats including construction work, decoration work, and furniture.

faq1.que: Strong and durable, superior to general wood
faq1.ans: An innovative process of heat treatment and high pressure compression makes these bamboo materials highly stable: resistant to impacts, free from bending, cracking, and shrinking.

faq2.que: Fire resistant, termite resistant, mold resistant
faq2.ans: Modern production technology and revolutionary processes create a bamboo material that is highly resistant to fire, termites, and mold, with minimal maintenance and a service life that extends for decades.

faq3.ans: Fused Bamboo is a unique material that is naturally beautiful. It can be used to design and decorate in a variety of styles.

faq4.ans: Our bamboo products are designed for a convenient and easy installation process, minimal maintenance that only requires regular cleaning, and an incredibly long service life.

faq5.ans: Bamboo is a plant that grows quickly and is naturally renewable. Choosing bamboo products helps reduce deforestation and environmental impacts, protecting and preserving the health of our planet.

faq1.ans: Teak is well known for its strength, resistance to fluctuating weather conditions including heat and humidity, resistance to pests and fungi, and remarkable longevity.

faq2.ans: When teak wood is polished the surface is smooth, easy to maintain, with all the golden color tones of natural teak wood. Add beauty anywhere with Thai teak!

faq3.ans: There are straight lines, curved lines, and spiral patterns, which create beauty and distinction. The unique wood pattern makes teak materials look lively and interesting.

faq4.ans: With low shrinkage and swelling values, teak wood maintains its shape and structural integrity. Teak does not easily warp or crack even when exposed to heat, water, or humidity.

faq5.ans: Famously, teak contains natural oils that help prevent mold and insects. This makes teak wood highly resistant to diverse environmental conditions, and it requires minimal maintenance.

service1.title: All Area Delivery
service1.sm_des: With comprehensive transportation options, SAKWW delivers to every area throughout Thailand.

service2.title: Product Packing
service2.sm_des: Items are wrapped with care in plastic and cushioning during delivery to increase safety and protect the wood.

service3.title: CCA Treatment
service3.sm_des: For a long life of outdoor use, CCA treatment maximizes resistance to weather, fungi, and pests.

service4.title: Wholesale
service4.sm_des2: Best source for various wooden materials, provide complete services with product quality and competitive prices.
service4.sm_des: The best source for various wooden materials, with complete services, high-quality products and competitive prices.

service5.title: Free! Cutting
service5.sm_des2: We offer cutting services when buying full pieces of wood, so our customers receive wood in the sizes desired.
service5.sm_des: Free cutting services are provided for full wood piece purchases, ensuring clients receive precise-sized materials.

service6.title: Get Advice
service6.sm_des: You can ask us questions at any time. Our team of experts is ready to answer your inquiries.
